extension_desc: CSS Peeper is a free online tool that helps you analyze and debug CSS code. It can be used to view the properties of any CSS element on a web page, as well as to identify errors in your CSS code.
Emmet is a keyboard shortcut plugin that helps you write HTML and CSS code more quickly. It can be used to generate code snippets, as well as to complete incomplete code blocks.

Wappalyzer is a tool that helps you identify the technologies used on a web page. It can be used to see what frameworks, libraries, and plugins are being used, as well as to get information about the web server and hosting provider.
Hot Reload is a tool that helps you develop applications without having to reload the page. It can be used to make changes to your code and see the results immediately.
React Developer Tools is a Chrome extension that helps you debug React applications. It provides a number of features, such as a component hierarchy view, a state inspector, and a debugger.
Redux DevTools is a Chrome extension that helps you debug Redux applications. It provides a number of features, such as a state inspector, a debugger, and a time travel debugger.
GitHub Developer Tools is a Chrome extension that helps you debug GitHub repositories. It provides a number of features, such as a code editor, a debugger, and a network inspector.
JSONView is a web-based tool that helps you view and edit JSON data. It provides syntax highlighting, autocompletion, and a live preview of your JSON data.
Postman is a tool that helps you test APIs. It can be used to send and receive requests, as well as to view the response data.
Displays a tree view of your GitHub repositories, making it easier to find and work with your code on GitHub.
Simple Allow Copy is a Chrome extension that allows you to copy text from websites that have disabled copying.
AdGuard AdBlocker is a free and open-source ad blocker. It can be used to block ads on websites, as well as to block trackers and malware.
